scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/*/package-lock.json apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:cache:bball: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/bball/package-lock.json apps/bball/node_modules apps/bball/.next packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:cache:vball: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/vball/package-lock.json apps/vball/node_modules apps/vball/.next packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:cache:admin: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/admin/package-lock.json apps/admin/node_modules apps/admin/.next packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:cache:stats: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/admin/package-lock.json apps/admin/node_modules apps/admin/.next packages/*/node_modules
scripts.fresh: npm run clean:cache && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:bball: npm run clean:cache:bball && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:vball: npm run clean:cache:vball && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:admin: npm run clean:cache:admin && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:stats: npm run clean:cache:stats && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:start: npm run fresh && npm run dev
scripts.fresh:start:bball: npm run fresh:bball && npm run dev:bball
scripts.fresh:start:vball: npm run fresh:vball && npm run dev:vball
scripts.fresh:start:admin: npm run fresh:admin && npm run dev:admin
scripts.fresh:start:stats: npm run fresh:stats && npm run dev:stats
